description:
The anime takes place on the screw-shaped island country of Nejigajima and follows the two "Bokyabots" http://anidb.net/ch84241 [Heybot] and the Yurui Prince http://anidb.net/ch84240 [Nejiru] as they collect different "Bokya Neji" screws. When the Bokyabots wear the Bokya Neji screws on their heads, they`re able to compete in "Bokya Battles," battles for who can think up and tell the best jokes.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
The Screw Kingdom is a land where humans and VocaBots live in symbiosis, united by the screws they hold dear. Prince Nejiru is given a Screw Soul on his birthday, which leads him to his very own VocaBot, who awakens with a huge fart! Nejiru and his new bot, Heybot, then return to the kingdom to challenge his father to a VocaBattle for the throne!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: HeyBot Is Born with a Hey-Boom!
ヘボッと生まれて屁ボーン!

REGULAR.description:
Driven out of the castle, Nejiru and Heybot head out into town to collect VocaScrews, where they are confronted by the three down-on-their-luck VocaReemans. The VocaReemans want Heybot`s Bungle-Bungle Screw to complete their comedy act and escape their hum-drum jobs. Who will win this latest VocaBattle?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ネジ屋対ボキャリーマンズ!

REGULAR.description:
Nejiru and Heybot have just established their new store, the Screw-Ya, and are abruptly visited by wannabe main characters Moeru, Kathleena, and Suchat. They decide to VocaBattle for the title, but Nejiru loses easily due to missing a key screw! Could the mysterious, ghostly Yuko be the key to getting the impact their gags are lacking?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Scary-Scary! It`s My First Scary Story!
コワコワ~, はじめてのコワ話

REGULAR.description:
Heybot buys a mysterious screw seed off a mysterious woman. But although he and Nejiru put a lot of love into raising it, it ends up growing into one flat tree! Enlisting the help of the ninja Naganagamaru and his Stretchy-Stretchy screw, they manage to get the screw to grow... and grow... and it won`t stop growing until it reaches the moon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hebo Ryuu: Neji Tane no Sodatekata!
The Art of the Bonehead! How to Raise a Screw Tree!
ヘボ流・ネジタネの育て方!

REGULAR.description:
Heybot`s been kidnapped by the VocaReemans! Vocammy, who wants to take Heybot for herself, sends her devoted groupies out to steal him back! When Nejiru also comes after Heybot, they wind up in a three-way battle royal! Who will unlock a special move and earn Heybot`s eternal partnership?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヘボット, いなくなったってよ

REGULAR.description:
Nejiru and Heybot decide to compete in a race for a rare VocaScrew and a lifetime`s supply of Imochin! Heybot works with the Zodiac VocaBot Cat Vitiger, while Nejiru works with Vocammy, who is clearly plotting something. Cat Vitiger`s overwhelming speed gets Heybot out to an early lead, but he`ll have to deal with the missions doled out by the Walls of Voca if he wants to finish the race!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 激走! ボキャバトルレース

REGULAR.description:
Fuerlu and his friend Gyakuran have come to the Screw-Ya for help. Fuerlu can`t stop hiccupping up VocaScrews! Nejiru and Heybot try to help him, but the problem just gets worse and worse. And soon Nejiru`s own motives begin to appear a bit suspect...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heybot Makes More with a Sneeze!
ヘックションでフエフエのヘボ

REGULAR.description:
Heybot and Nejiru awaken to the sounds of samba music, and find the people of the town engaged in a mad dance. Everyone, from the maids to the king, is acting strangely! It turns out it all started when the king`s old rival Norio arrived to steal back the Groovy-Groovy Screw. To save his father and all the people of the town, Nejiru and Heybot must venture Groovy-Groovy Island to get it back!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 決戦! ノリノリヶ島!

REGULAR.description:
Heybot has grown tired of taking care of the spoiled Nejiru, and, after seeing an ad for a deluxe baby doll on TV, decides to turn himself into a baby. The paternal Zodiac VocaBot Daddyboar shows up to take care of him back at his own home, which inspires jealousy among his youngest baby boar, Inoshiro...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヘボットは赤ちゃんバブ

REGULAR.description:
Heybot, whose only form of excrement is farting, has a dream that some day, he might poop. The extinguisher Zodiac VocaBot Togroll is tired of putting out the little fires around him, and longs for a big fire to put out. One day, after the two meet, they are called to save aliens from a vicious monster on Saturn. Will it spell a chance for both of their wishes to come true?
Source: crunchyroll

Shortly after Nejiru loses a set of extraterrestrial screws in an online bidding war the VocaReemans, the island quickly becomes overrun by zombies! It turns out GeroReeman was possessed by the Sluggy-Sluggy Screw that they won at auction, and has been transmitting its curse of sluggishness to everyone around him. Can Nejiru and Heybot work together with GuchiReeman to combat this deadly (if slowly moving) threat?
Source: crunchyroll

Moeru and Kathleena hold a secret meeting with some of the show`s more unloved VocaBots about how they can take the protagonist slot from Nejiru and Heybot. The Mojimoji, in a moment`s passion, sticks his plug into a picture of Heybot... which causes the real-life Heybot`s switch to start swelling!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヘボットのアレがはれた

REGULAR.description:
The reptilian manager Mappiraja appears at the Screw-Ya with VocaBots Dekapurion, Ketsumakka, and Sexy Queen. They want to build a dance institute on Screw Island to show off Sexy Queen`s sexy moves, and ask Heybot and Nejiru`s help to secure funding. Despite assurances that they`ll receive ample compensation, it is quickly revealed that not everything is on the level...
Source: crunchyroll

Heybot and Nejiru yearn to go on a journey, which the bad boy rooster Toricky and his boss, the swan Hakusencho, are happy to provide. Together, the trio ends up having their fill of adventure... by getting themselves stranded on a deserted island!
Source: crunchyroll

Screw Island is known for being the happiest island in the world. Private detective Muraki Harukaze is sent to find the Screw Island Chronicle and learn the island`s secret. But when he arrives, he finds the entire island in the grips of "Cool Japan"!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ネジが島クロニクルの巻

REGULAR.description:
Nejiru and Heybot have a fight! When Nejiru insists he could easily replace Heybot with another VocaBot just as good, Heybot storms out in tears. Will this be Vocammy`s chance to swoop in and break up the pair once and for all?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: キケン! ボキャ美のターン

REGULAR.description:
Heybot and Nejiru visit a toy store, which is selling everything from Deluxe Heybots to Heybot sofubi dolls to the cheap knockoff "Patchbot." One Heybot Sofubi decides to follow our Heybot home and become his apprentice... but it turns out to be a sinister scheme to replace him in Nejiru`s heart!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Neji Sasaru, Yue ni Hebo Ari
Where There`s a Screw, There`s a Bonehead
ネジささる, ゆえにヘボあり

REGULAR.description:
Nejiru has enrolled in school. This might not seem unusual, except that Heybot is now the teacher for all the classes, as well. Despite suspicion from the students, classes continue, with Heybot constantly awarding Nejiru rare screws for good performance. It`s beginning to seem like there`s more to their presence than a simple desire for education...
Source: crunchyroll

Nejiru and Heybot win a trip to a hot spring in a lottery. On the way, they meet a rock `n` roll horse named Charabred. Intrigue abounds between the Mini-Mini Inn`s proprietress and the tough guy owner of the Manly-Manly Hot Springs Hotel. The only way for the trio to get to the bottom of it is... time travel?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Rock to Steaming Rock `n` Roll!
ヨロシク, 湯煙ロクンロー

REGULAR.description:
Heybot and Nejiru arrive at Gekidora Hanten, a lawless restaurant land where VocaBots compete to see who can make the most delicious food. The youngest of the four Gekidora Brothers, Gekiatsu Dragon, claims to be the heir to their father`s cooking arts. But can he prove it in a culinary battle for ownership of the restaurant?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヘボ流・キッチンバトル!?

REGULAR.description:
Heybot has been shut away in his room, with the lights out, for a long time now. Worried, Nejiru peeks in... to find Heybot is obsessing over video games! Soon, a screwy mishap results in the video game and real worlds overlapping. Can our heroes set things right with the power of references?
Source: crunchyroll

A TV report on a "Mountain of Terror" leads Heybot and Nejiru to Mt. Pandai in search of treasure. But instead of a wealth of screws, they find the Happy Colorful Village, a refuge for rejected character designs. The village leader promises to assign their designs color if they work hard enough, but a sinister plot lurks behind this supposedly "noble" cause!
Source: crunchyroll

What starts as a severe stomachache on the part of Nejiru and Heybot quickly escalates, as the sky suddenly darkens and a man called Lord Nejikill descends. Using dastardly tactics, Nejikill steals all the Zodiac screws, as well as Heybot`s own screw soul and Bungle-Bungle Screw! When things get this bad, there`s only one thing that can save our heroes... a new character debut!
Source: crunchyroll

Heybot and Nejiru go to see King Jiru, brimming with questions about Peyket and Chigiru. At the palace, they learn about Nejiru`s mother and the secret of Chigiru`s birth. Heybot also learns about what makes him Peyket`s "brother," and they hold a VocaBattle to test their respective skills!
Source: crunchyroll

Screw Island is holding its yearly comedy contest, with the grand prize being a limited edition screw. Naturally, Nejiru and Heybot quickly enter. But they might just meet their match in the form of a legendary comedy duo from Cool Japan, Nagareboshi!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Shooting Star That Slipped Up and Flopped
ツルっとオチた流れ星

REGULAR.description:
The Imochin mascot, Imochin Prince, appears before Heybot. He`s going to be rewarded for being the world`s premier Imochin afficionado with a special pack of delicious and gorgeous Imochin! The only catch is... he has to grow it himself!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: プリンス・オブ・いもチン

REGULAR.description:
For failing to learn from their continued losses, Peyket and Chigiru take Heybot and Nejiru on a training march to the God Screw. But what starts out as a routine pilgrimage to the extraterrestrial creator of all screws ends up as a trip through the factory where Heybots are made and tested... in other words, Hell!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heybot and Peyket`s Trip Through Hell
ヘボット, ペケット 地獄めぐり

REGULAR.description:
After being replaced by a new rival pair, the Moe-Kath Trio are down in the dumps. Then, Kathleena decides that Suchat is the real reason behind their continued failures! Will rigorous training with Chigiru lead Suchat to a new gimmick that will make him a star?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さらば, 愛しのモエカス!

REGULAR.description:
A red loincloth flutters through the air, sending a voice upon the wind: "It`s okay! It`s just fine!" Meanwhile, Mandriver and Lord Nejikill arrive at the Screw-Ya and reveal their own tragic backstories. But before things can get too heavy, the loincloth interrupts... and from it, an incredibly special new screw appears!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Just Fine! It`s Totally Awesome!
イインダヨ~, スゴスゴインダヨ~

REGULAR.description:
The battle continues for the Awesome Fine Screw, the screw so awesome no `bot can get enough. While Nejiru and Heybot, the two time travelers, Chigiru, and the VocaReemans compete for its favor, Peyket wonders why the new screw won`t even look his way. Will he be able to prove himself with a VocaBattle?!
Source: crunchyroll

Heybot and Nejiru decide to fire up their Heybotournament game for the first time in a while. But the game`s antagonist, the genius inventor Dr. Nejily, seems to have some kind of grudge against the two! He uses the power of the Shady-Shady Screw to project himself into the real world and encourages all comers to his laboratory to try to get it from him! Can our heroes surmount the dungeon`s dangers and find the powerful new screw?!
Source: crunchyroll

Screw Island is all abuzz with news about the new phantom thief, Polidoroheybo! Heybot is about to be falsely arrested for the crimes by the police dog Polidoro, when a new advance notice from the culprit arrives. The thief`s next declared target? Heybot himself!
Source: crunchyroll

Nejiru and Chigiru enjoy all-you-can-eat ice cream, and end up with terrible cavities. Miraculously, they just happen to receive a flyer from a dentist`s office the next day. But when they arrive at the "Dental Cattlinic" run by Dentaurus, they get drawn into an adventure involving shady scams, miniaturized drill tanks, and tooth-dwelling alien invaders!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brush Your Teeth! Beef, Runaway Cavities!
ハミガキしようぜ 牛肉, ミソッパ!

REGULAR.description:
A Screw Island magazine publishes a damning expose on the Awesome Fine Screw: He`s been a normal screw this whole time! Ashamed, Awesome Fine Screw retreats to a lonely island far into the ocean. While lamenting his lot in life through song, he suddenly finds himself declared the chosen one of a terror-stricken populace.
Source: crunchyroll

Private detective Muraki Harukaze is back on Screw Island, investigating the disappearance of an eccentric billionaire who ran off with the world`s most dangerous book: the Screwcronomicon! With Nejiru and Heybot along, he travels to Innsmouth Beach, where a terrible and ancient secret awaits...
Source: crunchyroll

Lovable ovine lug Dagasheep, proprietor of the best teppanyaki stall on Screw Island, falls in love with every girl he meets. His every attempt ends in heartbreak, but when Vocammy becomes the next girl to catch his eye, Heybot decides to try and help him. Will Heybot help Dagasheep win love... and get his stalker off his back?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koi no Hera Gaeshi Gaeshi Gaeshi
The Flip, Flip, Flip of Love!
恋のヘラがえしがえしがえし

REGULAR.description:
Muka Muka Chori arrives at the Screw-Ya with a request: help her track down a hot guy she met on Fretter! She doesn`t know anything about his real life identity, though, so to track him down, they need the aid of Hacker Rat. Hacker Rat guides them into cyberspace to help them track down her man, but will they make it out alive?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dennou Nezumi wa Bokyabot no Dame o Miruka
Do Cyber-Rats Dream of Loser Vocabots?
電脳鼠はボキャボットのダメを見るか

REGULAR.description:
With the gathering of the twelve Zodiac VocaScrews, the world is going to be destroyed! Failed characters realize that this is their time to shine, and the main characters` nonchalance in the face of this uprising earns the wrath of God. Soon, failed characters and main characters are pitted together in a competition to see who will control the story, and who will get sent to Hell!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 12 Tai Sorottara Erai Koto ni Natta
12体そろったらエライ事になった
When All Twelve Are Together, Things Get Serious!

REGULAR.description:
It`s time for the return of Nejiru and Chigiru`s mother, Queen Naguri! She`s expecting to see Nejiru grown up and muscled up, but how will she react when she sees the scrawny, lazy boy he really is?
Source: crunchyroll

A terrible case is unfolding on Screw Island: Saturn Hag has been hella stabbed with Awesome Fine Screw, and the main suspects are Nejiru and Heybot! Can Vocammy`s lawyer skills save the duo from a long prison sentence?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Courtroom Files of Lawyer Vocammy!
弁護士ボキャ美の法廷ファイル!

REGULAR.description:
Vocammy`s lawyer skills were unable to save the duo from a long prison sentence. Now Nejiru, Heybot, Chigiru, and Peyket are all in jail after the events of last episode. Unable to bear the terrible weight of continuity, the group plots a way to bust out of prison and return to freedom.
Source: crunchyroll

The Screw Island castle has been taken over by cat maids! Their ransom consists of the twelve Zodiac VocaBots, whom they intend to offer to the God Screw in exchange for one wish. Can the VocaBots work together to save the castle... with the power of love?!
Source: crunchyroll

Queen Naguri has made her move to turn Screw Island into a martial arts kingdom by holding a VocaScrew Martial Arts tournament. She`ll be inviting participants from all over the world! But not all of Naguri`s disciples have affection for their former teacher...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Neji Ken Bokya Fes in Nejigashima
Screw Fist VocaFest in Screw Island!
ネジ拳ボキャフェスinネジが島

REGULAR.description:
Heybot: The Movie is out, but reviews are decidedly mixed. To teach the bickering Nejiru and Heybot a lesson about the importance of quality cinema, the Movieities send them inside of a movie. To get out, Nejiru and Heybot must make amends with the help of the classiest of plot devices: the body swap!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Heybot: The Movie! Wait, What`s That?
劇場版ヘボット! って, ナニそれ?

REGULAR.description:
Panic sweeps Screw Island as all the screws begin losing their ridges. Nejiru in a panic, and Peyket and Heybot won`t stop fighting over whether they should still be called screws, or reclassified as nails! Will the plot be resolved in a logical fashion, or will it simply dropped for next week?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ギザギザ・ザ・ネジ山

REGULAR.description:
When Nejiru, Heybot, and Peyket stumble upon a newly built screw factory, they get to learn the complex process by which screws are made, from harvesting to shaping to voice recording. They even get to make their own! But will the power go to Nejiru`s head?
Source: crunchyroll

Danger awaits when Muraki Harukaze and his team comes to Antarctica to find a missing research expedition. Terrible secrets are thawed from the ice as the final chapter of Heybot begins!
Source: crunchyroll

Screw Island`s dark history is finally revealed. The universe is on the verge of collapse. Heybot, Nejiru, and their allies... don`t actually care very much, but there probably won`t be any cool action scenes if they just ignore it. Thus, the heroes head out to save the day!
Source: crunchyroll

The new VocaScrew Quartet heads deep into the God Screw to try to stop Fine from destroying the universe. Secrets are revealed, sacrifices made, character designs recycled. Can Nejiru and Heybot save the universe once and for all?
Source: crunchyroll

Beyond all the mysteries that surround Heybot and Screw Island, there lies one final truth buried deeper than all the others. To right a great wrong, Heybot and Nejiru must uncover this secret... but will doing so will bring an end to all their Sundays?
Source: crunchyroll
